alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 10:20AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG TO SEVERE THUNDERSTORMS MAY AFFECT THE BOUNDARY WATERS CANOE AREA WILDERNESS THIS AFTERNOON INTO EVENING... Strong to severe thunderstorms may affect the Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness from the middle of this afternoon into this evening. The storms may produce gusty winds up to 30 to 60 mph, pea up to quarter size hail, frequent cloud- to- ground lightning, and locally heavy rainfall. Thunderstorms could happen as early as 3 pm CDT, with the most likely time for thunderstorms between 4 pm CDT and 9 pm CDT. Now is the time to prepare in case thunderstorms threaten. Campers should take extra precautions in order to secure campsites and make a plan in case of severe weather. In case of lightning, sit on your personal floatation devices or sleeping pads to minimize your risk to lightning. Monitor NOAA Weather Radio for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
